  • Constructor Details

    • LdMatrixWriter

      public LdMatrixWriter​(VariantIndex variantIndex, File outputFile) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      outputFile - the output file.
      variantIndex - The index to use for the variants.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Exception thrown if the output file was not found.
      IOException - Exception thrown if an error occurred while attempting to write to output file.

  • Method Details

    • addVariant

      public void addVariant​(int variantIndex, ArrayList<Integer> variantIds, ArrayList<Double> r2s, Deflater deflater) throws IOException
      Writes a variant to the file.
      Parameters:
      variantIndex - The index of the variant.
      variantIds - The indexes of the other variants.
      r2s - The ld r2s between the variant and the other variants.
      deflater - The deflater to compress parts of the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if an error occurred while attempting to write to output file.
